The correct answer is C: Big white text saying "HERE IT IS". 

In the video description, the speaker mentions that when the audience sees the title of his song "Pirates Rave" appear on the screen, it will be in big white text that says "HERE IT IS." This indicates that option C is the correct answer. The other options (glowing neon-like title, bold banner, and caption) do not match the description provided in the video.
The answer should be based on the visual elements shown during the speech segment. Please describe what you see on the screen in detail, including colors, fonts, and any interactive elements present.
